paramInformation.label: Time Interval Based Switch Status Reporting

metadata.inclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release (LED flashes twice per second during process, turns off when successful).
metadata.exclusion: Press and hold the button for 4 to 7 seconds, then release (LED flashes once per second when successful).
metadata.reset: Power cycle the device, then press and hold the button for 7-11 seconds within 60 seconds of power cycle.
